name: R.K.Sansthan

address: Sector 3, house no 166, Housing Board Colony,

briefDescription: R.K. Sanasthan is a development entity with a commitment for social development R.K. Sansthan was registered and established in the July 27th 1982 at Jaipur, capital of Rajasthan and is working since then in the areas of development of entrepreneurship and human Resource, health care, sanitation, environment, gender issues, information dissemination and socio-economic initiatives at micro level. The work of RK Sansthan is spread all over Rajasthan. The Organisation is registered under Societies Registration Act 1958, 12A and 80G of income tax Act 1961 and FCRA 1976 Also registered as Rajiv Gandhi Udyami Mitra under Ministry of MSME, Govt. of India and IICA CSR HUB
